ygData.subject: NEAT with Pruning Phase : Positive result
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a quick note to say that I got the pruning phase stuff working yesterday and initial results look good. The OCR experiment without pruning usually topped

X-Yahoo-Profile: alienseedpod

Just a quick note to say that I got the pruning phase stuff working 
yesterday and initial results look good. The OCR experiment without 
pruning usually topped out at about 10 out of 26 characters (best result 
seen was 16/26 I think). With pruning switched on I see searches 
consistently attaining 20/26 with a current best of 24/26.

Obviously a lot more details to come on this one.

Colin.
